name: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialAssertionRequest
desc: An interface for requesting a public key-based credential assertion.

items.name: var relyingPartyIdentifier: String
items.desc: The domain name of the website for the credential.

items.name: var allowedCredentials: [ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialDescriptor]
items.desc: A list of allowed credential descriptors the user attempts to sign in with.

items.name: var userVerificationPreference: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialUserVerificationPreference
items.desc: A preference that indicates whether the authenticator attempts to verify the user at the time of sign-in.
